description:
Let's make takoyaki on the Nintendo Switch™!
Use your utensils well to make delicious takoyaki!
Share Joy-Con™ and play with up to 4 players!
Reach for the ultimate high score!

<Rules>
Cook using a takoyaki-maker.
The points you earn depend on how well your takoyaki are cooked!
Make as much as you can before time runs out!

<How to Play>
1. Fill the holes with batter and ingredients.

2. Once the takoyaki start to smoke, flip them over!
   If you're too fast or too slow, it's a flop!
   Once both sides are well cooked, finish by placing your takoyaki in the box!

[Score Attack]
Aim for 1st place on the leaderboards by making as much takoyaki as possible!

[Battle]
Test your takoyaki-making mettle against others!
name: Make it! Takoyaki
intro:
It's a street-food classic: a takoyaki-making challenge!
Make as much takoyaki as you can!
